summary:
Tired of your burly Nord warrior being called a sneak thief?
Then look no further, for this mod puts a halt to that.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Better Guard skill comments
Version: 1.01
Date: 2/16/2012
Category: NPCs
Author(s): Dark_Lord_
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9977

Description
===========
This plugin makes changes to the comments guards make about your skills. Normally a guard comments on a skill that is level 30 or above. So a pure warrior type, who happens to have leveled Sneak to 30, is constantly called a sneak thief by guards.

This mod raises the skill level required for such a comment. So now guards will comment on things you really do, instead of things you rarely do. No more sneak thief comments for burly non-sneaking warriors.

There are, as of now, 2 versions of this mod. The first original one will raise the required skill level to 70. The second one will raise it to 50, making comments appear earlier.

ONLY choose one of these mods, because they will conflict with eachother, as they edit exactly the same thing.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to the Skyrim Data Directory. Mostly it is: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.


Incompatibility
===============
Since this is my first serious mod, I am not familiar with compatibility.

However, I think this mod should be compatible with about anything, except mods that change the same dialogue as this one.


History
=======
Version 1 - Current and probably only version. Raises skill requirements for comments to 70
Version 1.01 - added another file. Its basically the same mod, but with a requirement of 50 instead of 70.

Contact
=======
You can contact me by PM on this site or on the official BethSoft forums, where I am known as Dark_Lord_ .

to know what mods are including my work.
